text: Robert Matthew West (born June 25, 1956) is an American voice actor and graphic designer. He is best known for being the original voice actor of Barney The Dinosaur in the PBS series Barney & Friends Heâ€™s also had other voice roles in other media. He retired from voice in Barney in 2000. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1956 births Category:American voice actors
